Source.Name: fresh
Source.Summary: Terminal-based IDE and text editor with familiar UX
Source.Description: Fresh is a terminal-based text editor that brings the intuitive, conventional UX of editors like VS Code and Sublime Text to the terminal. It features native menus, command palette, full mouse support, multi-cursor editing, LSP integration, TypeScript plugins in a sandboxed Deno environment, and efficient handling of very large files with low memory overhead.
